function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Scalability challenges with blockchain-based platform for managing digital transformation technologies.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of legislation for governance rights, ownership, and distributed storage structure of blockchain.","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges with the infrastructure for 5g network, including cost, security, and early stage development.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Fragmented digital technologies may not effectively address contemporary problems created by the pandemic.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to build a critical mass of engaged users for digital contact tracing apps.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of adoption and trust in the proposed digital transformation framework architecture.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration of data sources and digital technologies may lead to privacy breaches and unauthorized access to sensitive healthcare information.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Holistic digital transformation framework may face challenges in adoption and implementation, leading to inefficiencies and gaps in the healthcare system.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased reliance on digital solutions may result in cybersecurity vulnerabilities and cyber-attacks, posing a threat to the integrity and availability of critical healthcare systems.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global spread of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential future pandemics","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Interaction between urban environment and pandemics","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of security layers in urban environments to combat future pandemics","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of architectural and urban design on the experience of gated community residents during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Factors influencing resident preferences for gated communities during pandemics","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Crowding in public housing accelerating the spread of the virus","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of natural ventilation in apartment buildings","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift from physical to virtual environments for safe interactions","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"}]}
